jobdetails.text:
As we continue our pursuit of creating an impact, we are looking to add Full Stack Developers to our product and consulting teams. We design, build and operate the services we own and we give our development teams all the autonomy they need to move fast and innovate. The development teams deliver services and user experiences to both internal and to external users and clients, built on some of the most modern platforms.

Everything is TRU when you're part of an awesome team. As an engineer, you will work as part of a small, autonomous team to deliver services and experiences for use in both internal and external applications. We are looking for top notch digital web engineers who are great team players and obsessive about the quality of their code and service.

We give our engineers the freedom to innovate in application design, development processes and automation so that they can deliver the very best result for our customers and continuously optimize the performance of their team.

Our teams design, develop, test and support their services so you’ll have the opportunity to be part of every stage of the process and take pride in delivering great new services with excellent reliability.

We expect our engineers to take on significant personal responsibility for delivery but we do it in a fun team-oriented environment. More than anything else, we’re looking for people who want to be part of an elite engineering team and have the opportunity to learn and grow.

TRU believes in building diverse teams. We actively try to bring together people with a wide variety of backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We encourage collaboration with internal partners and team members to achieve a collective result. We want our team members to think big and simplify things that are complicated.

Our engineering culture is built on continuous learning and supported by transparency, trust and cooperation. We have a great mix of senior and junior engineers which gives everyone a chance through teamwork and mentorship to build their knowledge and experience.
jobskills: Ability to estimate your own work and effectively communicate progress and escalate issues
Ability and willingness to learn and constantly improve
To be a supportive team player
